summary.para: Specifies a new attribute value for a topology node.

remarks.para: Due to an error in the structure declaration, the u64 member is declared as a 32-bit integer, not a 64-bit integer. Therefore, any 64-bit value passed to the method is truncated to 32 bits.

summary.para: The identifier of the topology node to update. To get the identifier of a topology node, call .
GUID that specifies the attribute to update.
Attribute type, specified as a member of the enumeration.
Attribute value (unsigned 32-bit integer). This member is used when attrType equals MF_ATTRIBUTE_UINT32.
Attribute value (unsigned 32-bit integer). This member is used when attrType equals MF_ATTRIBUTE_UINT64. See Remarks.
Attribute value (floating point). This member is used when attrType equals MF_ATTRIBUTE_DOUBLE.
